name: Affecto
description:
Founded in 1991, Affecto Lietuva is one of the leading IT services providers in Lithuania focusing on complex, critical enterprise system development, implementation, consulting, training and maintenance. Company currently employs over 200 IT professionals.
Affecto Lietuva concentrates on four core areas: Versatile Customer Specific Operational IT Solutions (including ECM, ERP and Insurance systems implementation and Business Intelligence Solutions.
